channel.title: The Show
channel.itunes:author: THE HOUSE MOGULS
channel.description: Stepping away from the studio, The House Moguls (Bill Basil & Gus Calderone) deliver an exclusive podcast entitled "The Show," bringing their personalized sound to you and, the world. Offering a unique blend of their top picks. "The Show" is the only destination where you will here tomorrow's dance music today!
